# authentik_stage_endpoints (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "authentik_endpoints_connector_agent" "name" {
  name = "agent"
}

resource "authentik_stage_endpoints" "name" {
  name = "agent-connector"
  connector = authentik_endpoints_connector_agent.name.id
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `connector` (String)
- `name` (String)

### Optional

- `mode` (String) Allowed values:
  - `optional`
  - `required`
 Defaults to `optional`.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
